1010010100101000 1110011100111111 1 -> sum: 1000110001101000, cout: 1
1011010011010111 1010010110101101 1 -> sum: 0101101010000101, cout: 1
1011110000110101 1010000101111101 1 -> sum: 0101110110110011, cout: 1
0111010000011111 1100111000010101 1 -> sum: 0100001000110101, cout: 1
0011000101011101 0101101111000111 0 -> sum: 1000110100100100, cout: 0
1001010110011000 0101100001001000 0 -> sum: 1110110111100000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
